front.title: IEEE/ISO/IEC International Standard - Information technology - Telecommunications and information exchange between systems - Local and metropolitan area networks - Specific requirements - Part 1Q: Bridges and bridged networks - AMENDMENT 7: Cyclic queuing and forwarding
front.abstract: The use of traffic scheduling and per-stream filtering and policing to support cyclic queuing and forwarding are described in this amendment to IEEE Std 8802.1Q-2016.
